body: Wish he would just abandon the original.

@Biased Bastard Yes. The author is continuing the original series, and getting  an official sequel. The thing is, who knows if he'll make a chapter 2 since they'll be busy doing the official sequel to the original manga.

@HentaiGirl69 you're saying the author is continuing the original? So that's why we have to wait longer for second chapter of this hentai version? I like this series very much but it's hard to follow. Can you tell me more? How much do you know?

Welp, this 'what if'/non-canon doujinshi from the author is great.   Too bad that there won't be a chapter 2 for a while since the author is working on a official sequel series to the official manga that this doujin is based off on.
Wow.. that was awesome! More pls
